Agentic Internet

Lobster Internet

Tools, autonomy, and feedback loops for real-world agent systems.

Why “Lobster”?

  • Hard shell: robust guardrails and constraints.
  • Soft center: flexible planning and adaptation.
  • Claws: decisive tool use under uncertainty.

Agentic Internet Stack

  1. Observe: pull state from APIs, docs, and runtime.
  2. Reason: turn goals into explicit, testable plans.
  3. Act: execute tools, write code, ship artifacts.
  4. Verify: evaluate outcomes against constraints.

Operating Principles

Fast loops beat perfect plans.

Ground claims in primary sources.

Automate checks before shipping.

Ship the Claw, Not the Theory

Build, measure, and iterate until it works in production.
